project_name: 巴西桑巴乐团 Quebra Cavaco (Roda de Samba, Brazil)

venue_info.venue_address: 北京市朝阳区神路街39号地下一层 DDC酒吧

project_info:
5/24 21:00 巴西桑巴乐团 Quebra Cavaco (Roda de Samba, Brazil)
 
Quebra Cavaco
巴西桑巴乐团
Roda de Samba, Brazil
Quebra Cavaco带来了巴西传统圆桌桑巴的美丽和轻松氛围，每个人都会一起唱歌，将能量推向天空。拿起你的啤酒、巴西柠檬酒，与我们一起享受这场难以错过的圆圈演出！
 
Born in the deep nights of Beijing, QUEBRA CAVACO is a samba group that aims to fill the gap of Brazilian music in the capital’s and China’s cultural scene. It is formed by a group of five Brazilian guys from different parts of Brazil and thus with distinct and rich music backgrounds: Diego (guitar and vocal), João Souza (pandeiro), Jonas (cavaquinho), Pedro Henrique (surdo & general percussion) and Matheus Santi (cavaquinho & tantã). 
Vocal & Guitar - Diego Galdino
Pandeiro - João Souza
Cavaquinho & Tantã - Matheus Santi
Cavaquinho - Jonas
Surdo & General percussion - Pedro Henrique
 
【DDC入场须知】
非不可抗力因素，门票一经售出概不可退，可自行转票；
谢绝自带酒水食物入场，入口处有存包柜，场内设有衣架；
场内一楼不设座；
严禁携带易燃易爆等危险品及管制刀具入场；
手机建议静音或震动，拍照请勿开闪光灯；
场内禁烟，文明观演，勿妨碍他人观演。
